objective: Locate the legacy form pasted in the repository and extract all reusable branding elements so the new React app visually and behaviorally matches the legacy form.
actions: Search the entire repository for legacy HTML, CSS, JS, and asset files.
Identify logos, icons, background images, and note their file paths.
Extract color palette (HEX/RGB), font families, font sizes, spacing, border radii, shadows.
Extract button styles, input styles, focus/hover states, and error styling.
deliverables: Design token specification (colors, typography, spacing, radii)
Rules for translating legacy CSS into React-compatible styling
acceptance_criteria: All colors and fonts come directly from legacy CSS
No new theme or palette introduced
Clear mapping from legacy styles to reusable components
